Bob Bruggeman, Mayor

903.798.3930 Email Bob Bruggeman

May 2012 – November 2027

Council Member for Ward 4, 2005 – 2012

Texas High School (1980) Texas A & M University-Texarkana, BBA (1984) Boston College, Certificate in Corporate Community Relations (1999)

City Involvement

Chairman - Bi-State Intergovernmental Advisory Committee Chairman - Texarkana Urban Transit District (T-Line) Metropolitan Planning Organization City Investment Committee Texarkana Chamber of Commerce Board of Directors AR-TX REDI Board of Directors

Kiwanis Club of Texarkana President - Council for Regional Health Education TASO – Texas Association of Sports Officials Texas A&M University - Texarkana Alumni Board Member

Bob has been married to Jackie since 1984. He has two daughters Liz and Olivia. He also has two grandchildren. Bob enjoys playing golf, umpiring baseball, and landscaping. He and his family are members of First Baptist Church.
